title: 最受欢迎的mc地图种子
author: seraph0012
txt_content:
本帖最后由 seraph0012 于 2013-7-8 20:30 编辑 

地图种子是一串用于生成世界的数字。玩家们使用相同的地图种子可以生成同样的的世界。

Minecraft Seeds Pro是一款关于mc地图种子的IOS和Android应用。里面的种子资源来自于玩家，你可以在这个应用中搜索特殊的种子并且与玩家讨论。你也可以将你的mc账号与这个应用关联，与你的朋友一起分享这个应用。在不久的将来这个应用将支持mc视频。

下面是在不同平台上的最受欢迎的地图种子：

PC/Mac版


1.Rickrollin by Minecraft Seeds


 2. 6038214531616065330 by Minecraft Seeds


file:///https://d1y0oqfyli6x95.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/artomix1-2.jpg3. Artomix by Minecraft Seeds

携带版file:///https://d1y0oqfyli6x95.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/captainsparklez3.jpg


1. CaptainSparklez by CreepyCreeper07file:///https://d1y0oqfyli6x95.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/rainbow_connection2.jpg



2. rainbow connection by JasonRice83

file:///https://d1y0oqfyli6x95.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/intercraft.png3. intercraft by Ryry0624


Xbox 360版file:///https://d1y0oqfyli6x95.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/13853274171.jpg


1. 1385327417 by Sir_Veillancefile:///https://d1y0oqfyli6x95.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/plus19954837893.jpg



2. +1995483789 by DeanoRYTfile:///https://d1y0oqfyli6x95.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/modded1.jpg



3. MODDED by Minecraft Seeds
